title: Recipe Recommendation System
description: Built a recipe recommendation system using dataset of 1.1M+ user ratings and descriptions of 230K+ recipes available on food.com.Achieved 85.62% accuracy using neural networks and 83.13% accuracy using tree-based algorithms to handle the large dataset.Implemented a nutrition score for each recipe, considering users’ dietary preferences, to provide personalized recommendations based on user preferences.

title: Course Recommendation System
description: Developed a course recommendation system using k-means clustering for grouping users based on similarity and SVD for reducing dimensionality.Introduced a novel weighted k-means algorithm to recommend courses based on ratings from multiple clusters, considering the distance of new users to each cluster.

title: Pi upto any precision
description: A C++ program to calculate the value of pi up to any desired number of digits using Borwein’s Exp-2 Algorithm and Newton’s Approximation for square root.

title: Zombie Shooter Game
description: a zombie shooter game using C++ and SDL2 library, featuring player-controlled character shooting zombies.

title: Space Adventure Game
description: Built a simple game in python using pygame library.

title: Uncompressed GIF to 24-bit BMP image convertor
description: Built a image converter using C. I mainly worked on BMP part
